mems.content: Lifecycle compact trace: User chose to start new task (option 2). Archived previous remediation trajectory for potential future reference.

Lifecycle compact trace: Completed marketing canvas and 19-slide presentation for Sữa Ông Thọ Tết 2026 campaign. Files saved: marketing-canvas-sua-ong-tho-tet-2026-02-19.md and presentation-sua-ong-tho-tet-2026-02-19.md

Lifecycle compact trace: Created market-research-framework skill (Technique type) covering Consumer Research, Market Sizing, and Trend Analysis. Bilingual (EN/VI), includes data validation tiers, TAM/SAM/SOM formulas, sample size guidelines, and evidence discipline rules.

Root Cause: HiveFiver journey contracts show boundary and schema normalization gaps under stress. Symptoms: todo.updated camelCase fields are dropped, action-level session updates create unbounded graph tasks, and event-handler hook writes tasks manifest directly (CQRS leak). Verification: code evidence in src/hooks/event-handler.ts, src/tools/hivemind-session.ts, src/lib/graph-io.ts plus runtime scratch simulation via npx tsx showing field-loss behavior. Files Changed: none (read-only audit).
Lifecycle compact trace: Completed commit 826e09ea context mapping review for hierarchy normalization changes

HiveFiver Integration Contract Map - Wave 3 GREEN Patch Validation (2026-02-20):

Producer: src/lib/hivefiver-integration.ts
- Function: detectAutoRealignment(message: string) -> AutoRealignmentDecision
- Interface: 13 fields (shouldRealign, reason, unknownCommands, recommendedCommand, recommendedAction, recommendedSkills, recommendedWorkflow, persona, domain, canAutoInitiate, requiresPermission, permissionPrompt?, nextStepMenu)

Consumer 1: src/hooks/messages-transform.ts
- Uses: shouldRealign, recommendedCommand, recommendedSkills, recommendedWorkflow, persona, requiresPermission, permissionPrompt, nextStepMenu (9/13 fields)
- Purpose: Build AUTO-REALIGN system reminder and checklist items
- Test coverage: 32/32 tests passing

Consumer 2: src/hooks/event-handler.ts
- Uses: recommendedAction, domain, persona, shouldRealign, canAutoInitiate, requiresPermission (6/13 fields)
- Purpose: Enrich TODO records with fallback HiveFiver metadata

Compatibility Status: COMPATIBLE
- TypeScript: 0 errors
- Producer tests: 9/9 passing
- Consumer tests: 32/32 passing
- Field access: All safe, optional fields guarded
- Regression risk: LOW

Test Gaps:
- Missing: permissionPrompt null case direct test
- Missing: End-to-end producer→consumer integration test
